Name: Sky Globe
LongDescription: Prevents Electric-type moves from damaging Flying-type Pokémon. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Flying-type Pokémon.  You can get a Sky Globe at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Sky Silk, a Sky Dust, and a Sky Gem. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
